news.image_caption: November 2020 Ask Me Anything next week
news.content:
It's a chance to ask the ThreeFold Foundation Team any questions you might have.

Please send us your questions in advance via email to info@threefold.io¬†or in this forum topic. üôè

Zoom Link Meeting ID: 850 3132 9163

Google Calendar Event The room will open 10 minutes prior to the call!

Take a look at Monday's Community Call for recent updates here.

& please spread the word!
news.excerpt: ThreeFold will be hosting an Ask Me Anything on Tuesday November 10 at 5pm CET!

previous.title: Liquid security breach, action suggested
previous.excerpt: We have just been informed there has been a security incident at Liquid.com. Although no funds seem to have been affected by the breach, Liquid.com does recommend all customers to change their password and 2FA at their earliest convenience.

next.title: DigiByte integrates with ThreeFold‚Äôs decentralized Grid
next.excerpt: The DigiByte Foundation and the ThreeFold Foundation are aligned ‚Äì both focused on values, working towards their visions and missions in creating a truly decentralized, equal, and sustainable world that empowers humanity.
